description: Medium priority datasets - Useful with adaptation

kaggle_logistics_warehouse.name: Logistics Warehouse Dataset
kaggle_logistics_warehouse.description: 3,204 records of logistics operations with lead times
kaggle_logistics_warehouse.preprocessing_notes: Focus on lead time validation and PP calculation

_evaluation.recommendation: MEDIUM - Useful but may need adaptation

zenodo_milan_telecom.name: Milan Telecom & Weather Dataset
zenodo_milan_telecom.description: Telecom traffic time-series with weather data (precipitation, temperature). Contains 5G network slice resource demand prediction data.
zenodo_milan_telecom.preprocessing_notes: Includes 5G base station traffic load data (SMS, Internet, Calls). Step column can be used as time index. Includes external factors like capacity, reject rates, etc. Perfect for SARIMAX.

_evaluation.recommendation: MEDIUM - Useful but may need adaptation

github_opencellid.name: OpenCellid Tower Coverage Dataset
github_opencellid.description: Over 40 million records of cell tower features, locations (lat/long), radio types, signal range, and coverage. Spatial logistics for tower maintenance supply chains.
github_opencellid.preprocessing_notes: Massive dataset requiring Dask for processing. Sample 1-5M records initially for feasibility. Critical for geographic demand forecasting and tower-specific logistics. Helps map coverage gaps to part needs, including long-tail rural sites. Use geographic coordinates for spatial modeling.
github_opencellid.notes: May need to sample due to 40M+ records. Geographic data perfect for Nova Corrente's 18,000 towers.

_evaluation.recommendation: MEDIUM - Useful but may need adaptation

olist_ecommerce.name: Brazilian E-Commerce Olist Dataset
olist_ecommerce.description: Brazilian e-commerce orders from 2016-2018 with customer, product, and logistics data. Proxies telecom-related consumer behaviors.
olist_ecommerce.preprocessing_notes: E-commerce data with order details from 2016-2018. Useful for consumer behavior patterns in telecom logistics. Proxy for demand forecasting.

_evaluation.recommendation: MEDIUM - Useful but may need adaptation

inmet_climate_bahia.name: INMET Climate Data - Bahia

columns_mapping.temperature: TEMPERATURA DO AR - BULBO SECO, HORARIA (°C)

inmet_climate_bahia.preprocessing_notes: Essential climate data for external factors in ML models. Temperature, precipitation, and humidity impact demand for telecom equipment.
inmet_climate_bahia.notes: Daily/hourly weather data for demand forecasting external factors

_evaluation.recommendation: MEDIUM - Useful but may need adaptation

kaggle_brazil_weather.name: Brazil Weather Information by INMET
kaggle_brazil_weather.description: Aggregated daily weather metrics from INMET. Precipitation, temperature, humidity for correlation with tower maintenance demands.
kaggle_brazil_weather.preprocessing_notes: Daily weather metrics from INMET. Essential for correlating weather with tower maintenance demands. High humidity (78%+) accelerates corrosion.
kaggle_brazil_weather.notes: Climate data for external factors in demand forecasting

brazilian_iot_structured.name: Brazilian IoT Market Structured Data
brazilian_iot_structured.description: Structured IoT connection data from 2020-2024, monthly granularity, sector breakdown (agriculture, logistics, smart cities, utilities, retail).
brazilian_iot_structured.preprocessing_notes: Generated structured data based on industry research. 28M to 46.2M connections growth. Perfect for IoT demand forecasting.
